response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value not just financially, but also in terms of its innovative features and potential impact on your business. Given its worth of $1,000,000 to you, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. We believe this represents an exceptional opportunity for you to acquire a game-changing asset at a highly competitive rate. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 950000}
